719767f-b.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Hester Street
719767f-b.text:
(1)  Forsyth Street, east side, north Trom and including Hester, to and
including East Houston Streets, as seen from Chrystie Street, and across
construction for the Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park.'
July 18, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPPODUCTIONS.


F
(2)
The same; alightly northwardJand showing the completed playground.
part of the park.
About 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRCDUCTIONS.

720419f-c.title: Manhattan: Hester Street - Forsyth Street
720419f-c.text:
(1)
Hester Street, south side, west from Forsyth, to and including
Chrystie Streets, as seen from Forsyth Street, and across clearance for
the Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park. Shown at the S.E. corner of Chrystie
Street, is P.S. No. 7.
July 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a different angle. Also shown is Chrystie Street,
west side, at Hester Street.
July 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same as No. 1, at a later date, showing the Manhattan Bridge
Plasa at Canal Street. Buildings on the right, are on Chrystie
Street, at, adjoining and north of the N.W. corner of Canal Street.
P.S. No.7, as shown in No's. 1 6 2, occupied the extreme right of this
clearance.  October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPPODUCTIONS.
720419f-c.folder: Hester Street & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

719766f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Hester Street
719766f-a.text:
(1)
Forsyth Street, north from Hester Street, and showing clearance
for the new Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park.
August 25, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, and showing the west side of Chrystie
Street across clearance.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same, from a view point slightly northward, (Grand Street) and
showing park under construction.
July 18, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

719765f-a.title: Manhattan: Forsyth Street - Hester Street
719765f-a.text:
(1)
Forsyth Street, east side, south from, but not including Hester,
to and including Canal Streets, as seen from Chrystie Street, and across
construction for the Sarah Delano Roosevelt Park. P.S. No. 65, is
shown at Nos. 42-52 Forsyth Street.
July 16. 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view of P.S. No. 65.
October 12, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

720418f-a.title: Manhattan: Hester Street - Forsyth Street
720418f-a.text:
(1)  Hester Street, south side, west from Forsyth, to and including
Chrystie Streets, showing P.S. No. 7, at the S.E. corner of the latter.
August 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUOTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, as seen across clearance for Sarah Dalano
Park. The street in the foreground is Forayth; Chrystie appears across
the top of view.
July 31, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
